physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Healed scar at the areolar border of the right breast; palpable 1.5-cm mass at the 10-oâ€™clock position in the anterior axillary line; no discharge or inversion of the nipples; no lymphadenopathy; left breast normal; remainder of examination normal.
A right partial mastectomy and sentinel lymph-node biopsy revealed an invasive ductal carcinoma measuring 0.9 cm by 0.8 cm by 0.5 cm, classified as grade 2 of 3, with invasion of lymphatic vessels.
